image/svg+xml
MathML Association Logo
svg.title: MathML Association Square Logo
svg.desc: This is an image of the mathematical formula "the W-th root of open paren W raised to the power W close paren" written in green on a black background that has the shape of a square with rounded corner. This image suggests mathematics and the World Wide Web.
